p: The edgeR package was used to perform difference analysis. The false discovery rate (FDR) < 0.05 and | log2 (multiple change) > 1 were set as the cut-off values for the screening of the differentially expressed genes (DEG). The gene co-expression network was constructed using the EBcoexpress package. The GO enrichment analysis of the DEG in the co-expression network was carried out using the Database for Annotation, Visualisation, and Integrated Discovery (DAVID) ( https://david.ncifcrf.gov/). KOBAS 3.0 ( http://kobas.cbi.pku.edu.cn/) was adopted to form a path map reflecting the DEG by the KEGG pathway enrichment analysis of DEG.
